content: Easily set up an impromptu work station while you’re on the go using this high-resolution pop-up display. It features an ingenious design that takes it from a compact package to a high resolution 24″ inch monitor in just seconds.

Stay close to your sweetheart even when you’re not near by giving her one of these unique encoded voice wave rings. The rings are available in finishes ranging from silver to platinum and each display the sound wave of a recorded 3 second clip.

Keep your yard looking prim and proper all year round without lifting a finger by placing the autonomous yard work robot on the job. This little guy works year-round to perform everything from mowing the lawn to removing leaves and blowing away snow.

Transfer potentially valuable information without anyone becoming the wiser using these hollowed out spy coins. They’re available in a range of different sizes depending on the desired currency type, and feature a slim storage compartment within.

Bring a piece of your favorite game to life by crafting your very own Doom BFG. These free to download schematics allow you to easily 3D print your very own life size replica of the enormous weapon from the iconic first person shooter, making it ideal for cosplay.

Old school games take on an entirely different feel when played from the world’s largest arcade machine. Created by video game enthusiast Jason Camebris, this Guinness world record holding machine stands 14 feet tall and and can play dozens of classic games.

Give your riding gear a futuristic look by using the motorcycle helmet lighting kit. This high-tech helmet provides the rider with superior visibility while the bright TRON-styled luminescent strips ensure all eyes stay glued on you as you zoom down the road.

Store your prized hooch like a loyal imperial by keeping it inside this Stormtrooper decanter. This elegant and geeky 750ml decanter is made from high quality super flint glass based on the Stormtrooper’s helmet from the original 1976 film.

Leave the dull culinary world of peasants behind by incorporating this exuberant golden olive oil into your kitchen. Each elegant glass bottle is hand-filled with 24-karat edible gold flakes that float around in a sea of the highest quality virgin olive oil known to man.

Art, engineering, and pure fun collide to form the thrilling transparent glass slide. This one of a kind piece is designed by the talented engineers over at Eckserley O’Callaghan, from two half cylindrical pieces of glass that stand at 15 feet tall.

Bring Rover along for the ride without tiring out his tiny little legs by carrying him inside this dog bicycle seat. The seat is mounted directly over the center of your bike for better handling, and it features a safety harness leash that you can attach to your dog.

The Seataci sunken hull concept yacht takes inspiration from the anatomy of a whale’s tail to smoothly navigate through open waters. The spacial main hull actually lies beneath the water’s surface to provide a truly one of a kind view of the ocean.

Explore your dream city without ever having to step outside of your house using this city explorer virtual reality game. It gives you the unique opportunity of walking all over a digitally-recreated San Francisco as if you were Godzilla.

Turn your workstation into the most comfortable spot in the office with the Aeron office chair. It features a redesigned tilt mechanism with an optimized balance point and utilizes elastomeric fabric to increase breathability and eliminate pressure points.

Become the envy of your geeky circle of friends by adding the replica Gantz:O X-Gun to your collection. Styled after the iconic weapon from the Gantz:O sci-fi flick, it comes with embedded LEDs and a fully functional display for added authenticity.

Experience heaven on earth by spending a few nights lodged in the Playa Viva tree house This exotic abode features a rustic wooden decor, is perched six feet above its lush green surroundings, and lies directly in front of an unspoiled tropical beach.

Enjoy some tunes while you cool off on a hot day by making sure you pack this ice cooler entertainment system along for the ride. Apart from the spacious 56 quart capacity, it features a built-in Alpine Bluetooth speaker and amp that blast out crisp sounding tunes.

Take your photography to the next level by capturing amazing shots with the Laowa 24mm f/14 relay macro lens. This extremely long lens features an ultra slim profile that allows you to get up close and personal to shy subjects like insects without scaring them off.

Tackle mother nature’s rugged terrain in a fun new way riding on top of one of these Outrider electric adventure vehicles. They’re fitted with a 2 kW motor along with a 1 kW battery – giving it a 30 to 50 mile range, while reaching speeds up to 30 mph.

Enjoy the soft glow of a gorgeous full moon any night of the year by keeping the fallen moon light at your side. This rechargeable light emits a warm gentle glow that’s cool to the touch so that you can hold it and admire its stunning features up-close.

Send your taste buds on a sugary overload by snacking on these Megaloads candy cups. Each delicious morsel combines your favorite snacks like M&Ms, Oreos, peanut butter, and caramel into a savory double-decker treat.

Prove you’re the ultimate Zelda fan in any realm by gaming on this levitating Triforce chest NES console. This fully functional NES console comes encased in an incredibly well designed and constructed chest –  complete with a spinning Triforce at the center.

Transform your home’s surrounding snow into an icy fortress the kids will love using this snow fort building set. The set is composed of specially designed tools and molds that enable you to build everything from castle walls to towers.

Whip up sweet treats from the comfort of your home’s kitchen using this DIY ice cream sandwich maker. It comes with an included recipe guide along with a silicone baking mold, plastic frame, and spatula so that you can easily make a batch when the mood strikes.

Take your look to infinity and beyond by rocking a pair of Vans Toy Story shoes. Each colorful pair features an “ANDY” signature on the sole and comes with a nostalgic design depicting iconic characters like Buzz Lightyear and Woody.

Avoid food poisoning and other stomach ailments by testing out your meats using this food freshness tester. This TV-remote shaped tester performs a bio-organic test that measures the gas levels in your meat, poultry, or fish to see if they’re safe to consume.

The quad shelving unit combines the beauty of color and geometry to bring you a decorative yet functional piece of furniture. A series of slanted shelves provide ample storage space for every movie, book, and record in your collection.

Snack like the 1% by munching on the world’s most expensive potato chips. These exclusive morsels are prepared with A-1 ingredients like truffle seaweed, Leksand onion, crown dill, and ammarnas potatoes that combine to create utter snacking perfection.

Add some urban flair to your delicious meals by finishing them off with these rap lyric fortune cookies. Rather than played-out generic fortunes, each cookie comes with lyrics from iconic rappers like Nas and Gucci Mane.

The incomparable Zac Posen has brought Cinderella’s fairy-tale dress to life with this incredible fiber optic dress. Worn by Claire Danes Met Gala, the dress features custom fiber optic woven with 30 mini battery packs sewn into a thin organza lining.

Go off the grid without forgoing the comforts of home by moving into the Greenmoxie tiny house. The eco-friendly 340 square foot home makes use of every inch of its compact layout to provide every amenity you’d desire, from electricity to a fully functional bathroom.

Give your home bar some rustic charm that’ll set it apart from the rest using this whiskey wood swivel bar stool. Available in either a circular swivel top or a fixed square top, each stool is crafted from a retired Jack Daniel’s whiskey barrel.

Shock and awe when you hits the streets this Halloween by making this golden rainbow haute couture mask part of your ensemble. The base of the mask is made from a stretch fabric that contours to your head while still allowing you to see through it.

The XM556 Microgun is the defense suppression weapon with enough power to take down whatever stands in its way.  Designed as a smaller and lighter alternative to the M134, it features Gatling-style rotating barrels that fire 5.56mm NATO cartridges.

Gain a deeper appreciation for science by learning about the universal principle of entropy with this deep sea sand art sculpture. Each time you rotate the glass ring, the different colored sands begin shifting to create deserts, mountains, clouds, rain, oceans and smoke.

Test your courage by spending a night inside Dracula’s Transylvanian castle. Nestled deep in the Carpathian mountains, Bran’s Castle offers accommodations for two and is hosted by Bram Stoker’s great grandnephew, Dacre Stoker.

Amaze onlookers by creating an eye-catching spectacle of lights using this electric pyro staff. Simply attach your professional pyrotechnics to the staff’s body, then connect the wire from the electric igniter to the BOOM stick to produce amazing visual effects.

Create a natural and more comfortable workstation while you’re on the go by placing your PC on the tiny tower laptop stand. It features a sleek aluminum construction, is height adjustable, fits up to 15″ laptops, and folds down in 5 just seconds.

This Abyss ocean table transforms the jagged seafloor into a breath-taking visual display that’ll add depth to any home. It’s crafted from stacked layers of wood, plexiglass, and glass to create a topographical map depicting the ocean floor.

Put your skee ball and mini golfing skills to the ultimate test with The Putting Arcade. In this fun mashup, you’ll have to putt a small golf ball through the narrow green patch and make it into one of the arcade bowling styled rings in order to rack up the most points.

titleEN: Milk and Cookies Dunk and Drink Set
content: This milk and cookies dunk and drink set is the portable snacking vessel designed to help you dip without making a mess. The cup of milk sits perfectly at the center of the wooden plate and is surrounded by a sea of cookies just waiting to be dunked.

Give your geeky pad some Empire inspired flair with this Star Wars tie fighter desk. The tie-fighter shaped  powder steel base sports a neutral grey finish and holds up a sunken tempered glass top ideal for work or displaying your Star Wars memorabilia.

Unleash your inner artist while expanding your art history knowledge with these famous artwork coloring postcards. Each 4″ x 6″ colorable postcard comes printed with a different painting by world renowned artists like Matisse, Picasso, and Dali.

Turn heads at Comic-Con by giving your favorite anime cosplay an added dose of authenticity by topping it off with these anime eye temporary tattoos. They stick onto your eyelids to create the illusion you have some impossibly big and colorful eyes.

Brush in the dark without having to turn on any bright lights using this glow in the dark toothbrush. It features soft double layered tapered top bristles blended with nano-silver technology and a neat light-absorbing phosphorescent handle that emits a cool green glow.

Keep your tent from turning into an oven once the sun comes out by staying inside the no bake tent. This tech ready tent features a roomy 6’6″ ceiling, is designed to withstand strong winds, and comes with a dual layer design that reflects sunlight so the interior stays cool.

Light up your nocturnal pool party in style by jumping in wearing this waterproof LED suit. The suit is composed of a breathable fabric that offers flexibility and is fitted with vibrant LEDs that you can control using a handheld remote.

Keep your vast wine collection organized and readily accessible with the wine library. This laser-cut iron corten library is available in 10 color options and lets you customize the size of your storage with modules of 8, 16, 18, and 24 bottle capacity.

Spice up your bland decor with an exotic touch by accenting the room using this bold rhino chair. It features a commanding presence that’s impossible to miss and is crafted from reinforced fiberglass with a padded black leather back for ultimate comfort.

Say goodbye to bulky helmets once and for all by protecting your noggin with this collapsible bicycle helmet. The ingenious and functional design allows you to collapse the helmet into a compact package that you can easily fit in your backpack or purse.

Go beast mode with some prehistoric flair by workout out using this stone kettlebell. Available in models weighing from 4 to 20 kilograms, each kettlebell features a primal stone and wood design that makes them seem like they were crafted in the Stone Age.

This 1957 Porsche 356 A 1600 Speedster is the ideal car for your next restoration project. Owned by a single family since 1967, it features almost all-original parts including an original matching-numbers 1600 engine along with a certificate of authenticity.

Experience the next generation in communication  by talking to friends and family through this Star Trek Bluetooth ComBadge. This officially licensed badge  syncs to your smartphone so that you can comfortably chat hands-free.

Give your living room an inviting casual feel with this one of a kind denim sofa. The sofa comfortably seats two adults, sports a sturdy mango wood frame, and comes fully covered in salvaged original Levi 501 jeans.

Own a piece of automotive history by adding this 1951 Willys M38 Jeep to your collection. This iconic vehicle has been fully restored to its former glory – complete with two inert machine guns, a gas can, radio, and a historically accurate phone for added authenticity.

These clippable shock absorbing horse shoes are the perfect way to keep your horse’s hooves protected without having to use any nails. These lightweight shoes feature a proprietary fastening system that allows you to easily clip them on to the hooves.

The State Fair has changed the game with these delicious cookie fries. This heavenly hybrid snack features fry shaped cookies topped with either chocolate chips or sprinkles and served with either chocolate or strawberry dipping sauces.

Turn your meals into art by creating fun designs using this desktop food 3D printer. It’s compact enough to fit on your kitchen’s counter top and lets you express your artistic side by creating food in the shape of classic cartoon characters.

Give your loyal followers a full-access peak into your glamorous life using these Snapchat spectacles. These stylish specs are designed to record up to 10 second 115 degree angle clips that are viewable from any direction.

Add some rustic charm to any room in your home by storing your stuff inside this wooden farm animal furniture. This quaint piece carries all the aesthetics of a wooden shipping crate – right down to the “fragile” stamp – and features ample storage space.

Turn a day out on the water into one of total relaxation by going out on this motorized hammock boat. The boat comes equipped with a small solar panel that powers the inboard electric motor and comfortably accommodates two full size hammocks.

Looking for the smell of a newly opened MacBook? There’s a candle for that. This new MacBook scented 100% soy wax candle lasts roughly 45-55 hours and features a delightful scent with hints of mint, peach, basil, lavender, mandarin, and sage.

The Ox all terrain vehicle is the ultimate way to deliver aid and supplies to places where roads are non-existent. This flat-pack vehicle can be assembled on site and features an ample cargo area that can carry over 2 tons or seat 13 people.

Make your love of cars apparent to everyone who enters your home with this Mustang engine block coffee table. This piece of automotive decor features a 4.6 liter Ford Mustang engine with the cylinder pistons welded into place to hold up the glass top.

Make lazy days around the house more enjoyable than you ever thought possible by snuggling up inside the cocoon chair. The chair features a sleeping bag like design that lets encase yourself in a fluffy comforter you can conveniently zip up and down.

Make your next celebration one to remember by unleashing a sea of confetti using this specialized gun. Equipped with 3 individual cannons, this special effects gun allows you to fire off each cannon individually or shoot all three cannons at once.

Increase your chances of survival when going into dicey situations by wearing this Devtac bulletproof helmet. The helmet is able to effectively stop a magnum 44 and features detachable polycarbonate lenses that are equally as tough.

Out-hipster every Millennial you encounter on the streets while riding atop this spider legs wheel bicycle. Instead of a traditional rear wheel, this unique ride boasts four metallic legs that will actually walk in sequence as you begin to pedal.

These man buckets are built to suit any type of man. Each bucket comes chock full of carefully curated items to match the buckets’s various themes like “Mr. Healthy”, “Man Snacks”, and “The Handyman” – so you can cater to your man’s likes and interests.

Unleash your little tike’s inner crime fighter by dressing him/her in these superhero winter jackets. These officially licensed geeky snow jackets feature an all over design based on the costumes of iconic heroes like Captain America, Iron Man, and the Hulk.

Get more use from your favorite novels by placing them atop this book cover wall lamp. This contemporary piece features a triangular matte white bracket which houses a 25 watt E14 lightbulb. It’s the perfect night light for a book worm.

Keep your kitty active and entertained while she’s inside with this laser chasing scratch post. Apart from acting as a sturdy scratch post for your kitty, the top of the device projects a red laser dot that moves all around the floor in random patterns.

Keep your little Pokemon trainers happy and full by having them snack on these delicious Pokemon styled cupcakes. These handmade edibles can be customized with one of 1 of 17 different flavors and decorated in 12 distinct Pokemon styles.

The Roborace driverless race car gives us a glimpse at the future of high-end Formula One racing. Instead of being piloted by a driver, the car is equipped with a series of sensors, radar, and a camera that allows it to be controlled remotely, topping out at 180 mph.

Show your furry friend some love by moving them inside this fabulous MDK9 dog house. Made from Brazilian teak, powder coated steel, and concrete, the home sports a contemporary design complete with interior lighting, a name plaque, and a comfy bed.

Fly down the road like a majestic bird riding atop the Bird of Prey lay flat aerodynamic racing bicycle. Rather than struggle against the wind, the lay down design maintains a low center of gravity that helps reduce wind resistance so you can travel faster than ever.

Take your designs to new creative heights by using Karl Lagerfeld’s art supply kit. The fashion icon and the Faber-Castell company bring you this limited edition kit containing 350 drawing instruments  between markers, pens, pastels, crayons, and colored pencils.

Maximize your bedroom’s limited space with this wall mounted fold out desk. The practical design takes up very little space against the wall and features a series of compartments that fold out to provide ample storage and desk space.

Give your ensemble a splash of color and whimsy by wearing this vibrant unicorn poop rainbow scarf. This small wide-eyed unicorn comes with a soft fluffy body that conceals a long and soft rainbow scarf that you can pull out of his ass for warmth.

Create a surreal ambiance in any part of your home by hanging up this lucid mirror on the wall. This unique piece places a luminous 3D image behind the glass surface of the mirror to create a heavenly reflection of sunlight and clouds on the mirror’s surface.

Send your taste buds on an out of this world ride by  making a batch of these delectable galaxy donuts. Instragram user @sobeautifullyraw provides step by step instructions on how to create these visually captivating and delicious vegan-friendly treats.

Tidy up like a loyal Imperial by placing your stuff inside this Star Wars AT-AT desk organizer. It stands just over 10.5 inches tall, comes filled with various storage compartments, and features tow hooks on the legs so you can wrap your cable around them.

This waterproof theftproof tech bag will ensure your belongings remain safe when they’re unattended. The handy roll-down design prevents access to the main compartment while the quick locking mechanism lets you secure the bag to any sturdy object.

The Floating Stingray luxury home takes ocean front living to incredibly lavish heights. Designed in the form of a giant stingray, this stunning abode features everything from an infinity pool and boat deck to incredible panoramic views of the Aegean sea.

Stay nice and breezy on hot and muggy days by wearing this jacket cooling system. It’s compact enough to fit under any jacket or shirt and features a small 3 speed fan that blows air up your back through a small rubber tube.

Transform your wine collection into a stunning alcoholic  work of art by displaying it using this modular wine rack. Available in a range of eye-catching finishes, the unique design adapts to fit your space and allows you to display the bottles either vertically or horizontally.

Time traveling may seem cool, but partying inside this DeLorean hot tub time machine looks way more fun. This Super-Fan Builds project transformed a real DeLorean into a state of the art hot tub complete with movie accurate accents, and remote controlled doors.

Increase the craftsmanship of your DIY projects using this handheld CNC router. This impressive and compact tool comes with an onboard display that facilitates precise cutting, but will also automatically correct for minor hand errors.

Enjoy spending a few nights in Bikini Bottom’s most famous residence by booking your stay at the Spongebob Squarepants pineapple villa. This 1,500 square foot 3 bedroom 2 bathroom villa comes decorated just like Spongebob’s underwater abode.

Unleash your AR-15/M16 rifle’s true potential by transforming it into a functional beer can cannon. This specialized add-on allows you to fire full 12 ounce cans as well as other similarly shaped objects at distances of up to 105 yards away.

Welcome in Fall like a true basic ass bro by pounding a few of these pumpkin spice latte beers. This tasty stout is made with a blend of dark roasted malts and cold pressed coffee beans that combine to form a bold taste of well-balanced Fall flavors.

Located in the picturesque Tanzanian archipelago of Zanzibar sits the paradisaical restaurant called The Rock. Accessible by boat during high tide, this enchanting establishment offers top-notch seafood platters and jaw-dropping views of the Indian ocean.

Now you can own a USB stick that destroys anything in its path. Once you plug in this weaponized USB kill stick, it will rapidly charge its capacitors from the USB power supply and then discharge it, permanently disabling any unprotected equipment.

Taking a walk through the city of tomorrow may be a lot more fun than you think thanks to this concrete ping pong table. Made from a mix of concrete and stone aggregate, it was designed to be used in public spaces throughout Australia and Europe.

Learn to putt like a pro by perfecting your game on this indoor putting green. This handcrafted piece features a series of breaks and notches on both sides that allow you to elevate the green, increasing the level of difficulty as needed.

This screw driven amphibious R/C vehicle is built to handle whatever terrain Mother Nature throws its way. The spiraling action of the dual motorized screws allow the vehicle to swiftly travel over grass, water, sand, and snow.

Relax like underwater royalty while laying out on this shell pool float. This massive vinyl shell measures 82″ x 83.5″ x 13.5″, providing ample room to rest comfortably and comes accented with two sturdy cup holders on each side.

Keep the kids entertained for hours by turning their room into an indoor playground with this slide down bunk bed. In addition to the slide and ladder, this amusing piece is crafted from solid birch and features a sturdy guard-rail and a sizable storage drawer.

This amazing robot arm drone comes with a pair of five-axis robotic arms capable of lifting up to 22 pounds. Its intrepid sci-fi inspired design can reach altitudes of 5,000 feet and it can perform a series of jobs such as flipping switches and cutting wires.

Incorporating this Iron Man kettlebell into your workout routine is guaranteed to get you into superhero shape in no time at all. This forty pound kettlebell is cast in iron and is designed to look exactly like Tony Stark’s iconic Iron Man helmet.
